pkgmetadata.longdescription: # What is Iguanas?Iguanas is a fast, flexible and modular Python package for:* Generating new rules using a labelled dataset.* Optimising existing rules using a labelled or unlabelled dataset.* Combining rule sets and removing/filtering those which are unnecessary.* Generating rule scores based on their performance.It aims to help streamline the process for developing a deployment-ready Rules-Based System (RBS) for **binary classification use cases**.
